Module.Name: Grove Panel Button
Module.Overview: This Grove Panel Button is a sister version of original Grove Button. They are identical except the Grove connecter is moved to the back so that you can easily use it as a neat and wire-free human interface device.

Function.Name: is_pressed
Function.Brief: Return whether or not button is pressed
Function.Description: This function will return *True* if the button is pressed and *False* otherwise.
